name: Deskaiser
description:
Deskaiser is a rpg game set a wasteland style openworld.  Fight Monsters, powerful bosses to survive.  level up and spend skill point, silver for become stronger!

Deskaiser have a fandom!: https://deskaiser.fandom.com/wiki/Deskaiser_Wiki

for suggestions, advertisements and cooperation contact me with mail;

gamefinity@yaani.com

NOTE:

Deskaiser is still heavily under construction. I am developing Deskaiser as a single person. Every penny I earn from purchases will be spent on game development. Thank you very much for your support!
